scripts.compile-client-protos: mkdirp generated/user && pbjs -r domain -t static-module -w commonjs protos/user/domain.proto -o generated/user/domain.js && pbts --no-comments -o generated/user/domain.d.ts generated/user/domain.js && pbjs -r api -t static-module -w commonjs protos/user/api.proto -o generated/user/api.js && pbts --no-comments -o generated/user/api.d.ts generated/user/api.js
scripts.build: npm run compile-desc && npm run compile-client-protos && tsc && cp -r generated dist
scripts.docker:publish: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:push
